attributes.action: Implement new policies to help the Construction and Housebuilding sectors
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Jobs are being lost with many others at threat both in the industry and via the supply chain . There are now weekly closures of many offices and depots with some of the largest companies in the UK in crisis. It is the most serious problem that we have faced   for many years and urge the Prime Minister and Cabinet to take action to help bring the sector back to it's feet and able to move forward again.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
